Shaan Batra

essays poetry twitter

I've spent the last decade working in tech as a product manager and software engineer. I'm now taking some time off to explore my interest in philosophy, art and storytelling. I plan to share my writing here. Some will be more logical arguments in the form of essays, others more artistic in the form of poetry and short fiction.
